name: fullstackopen-3
description: Part 3 for Helsinki University course "Full Stack Open"

scripts.build:ui: del build -Recurse && cd ../fullstackopen/osa2/puhelinluettelo && npm run build && xcopy /E /I build ..\..\..\fullstackopen-3\build
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Ville Reima
